short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: A feature-rich password manager Chrome extension

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Protect and Secure your online identities with ease.

------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Features
- Zero Knowledge Architecture
- Generous free account tier 
- Simple and convenient to use 
- Military grade encryption directly on your devices
- Available on Android, iOS, Web, Chrome Store

* best practices to further enhance your own safely online
https://neutronlock.com/security/

------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Use any of the following methods to secure your account:

Fingerprint Login 
Easy and quick access to mobile app using fingerprint (mobile app only)

IP Address Verification 
Any new IP addresses will be required to verify through mobile or email

Device ID Verification 
Mobile or email notification will be sent to approve new devices

Mobile App 2FA Login 
Receive notification on mobile to approve any new logins

TOTP 2FA Verification 
Use any 2FA TOTP apps like Google Authenticator or Authy

Backup Email 
Set a backup email for login, in case main email account has been lost
